answers.text: Data transfer between two regions (that is, data transfer between two EC2 instances in two different regions).
Data transfer between an EC2 and S3 in the same region.
Data transfer between two EC2s in two different Availability Zones in the same region.
Data transfer between two EC2s within the same Availability Zone (using a public IP address).
Data transfer between two EC2s within the same Availability Zone (using a private IP address).

text: For which of the following would you be charged?
